TableScriptText.Text: Yes?
The Divine Level is high enough to take on the <name>Crusade Mission</color> now
What is <name>Crusade Mission</color> about?
Excited? Hmm?
Good. I'm also thinking it's about time for an explanation.
Yet, it might be faster to ask the issuer of the <name>Crusade Mission</color>!
The Mission issuer...?
Oh! This place is {Village_Name1}!
That is!
Pew! Pew! Pew!
Oh, know that guy?
Yes. From earlier, when investigating abnormities...
I'm <name>Molan</color>, Castele Kingdom Vice-Captain for the Paladin. Issuer of the <name>Crusade Mission</color>.
Now: On to the matter at hand.
Various regions around Reveria are currently reporting discoveries of berserk monsters.
The Paladin naturally dispatched specialists there to fight...
But even those specialists are helpless in the face of such monsters!
To put it frankly, in this situation we are really short-staffed.
(Gulp)... Th-There're actually that many powerful enemies!
Yes! That's why this mission was issued to strong fighters throughout the kingdom.
And who successfully completes this mission will be presented with the highest honor.
...The highest honor?
Pew! Pew! Pew!
What's that?
Listen up. Beside basic payout, each <name>Crusade Mission</color> also grants...
a Royal <name>"Crusade Medal"</color> as proof of completion.
The number of "Crusade Medals" is equal to your honor standing, which means, your <name>"Achievement"</color>.
Getting the Royal <name>"Crusade Medal" </color> and the <name>"Special Rewards"</color>... That would be incredible!
That's not all. Crusade monsters may drop <name>"Tokens"</color> when you battle them.
Once you get Tokens, be sure you come to me to exchange them for <name>"Special Items"</color>.
<name>"Crusade Medals"</color> and <name>"Tokens"</color>... I just need to collect those!
Right. Please participate actively in the Monster Crusade. I look forward to your performance.
...and that's you there too.
Until next time then.
...That's it then.
Seems very concerned about {Avatar_Name1}.
Pika-pika.
The soaring monster population has become a serious hassle for people everywhere, meaning...
Meaning, ultimately God's Envoys may have to look into this situation.
However, enemies during this <name>"Crusade Mission"</color> all look really powerful
Pick your allies carefully and ready your gear before you proceed.
Understood!
{Avatar_Name1} go on and try the <name>"Crusade Mission"</color>!
Did that scare ya? Haha!
Here's a little gift for you, for working so hard.
{Avatar_Name1} thanks for your continued dedication.
Hey... {Avatar_Name1}.
This âGod's Envoy" run... Is it a bit too much for you?
Don't get me wrong. I'm not challenging your dedication or results.
...I just know how it feels to be bound by your mission.
If you're feeling a bit lost or overwhelmed you need to relax a little bit.
Then you might discover that the world starts to look different.
...I once received guidance like this from someone too, someone with eyes just like yours.
Forget it, heheh.
Hope we'll work well together from now on, {Avatar_Name1}.
Thanks for your continued dedication, {Avatar_Name1}.
This is a thank-you gift for always being nice to me Go ahead and take it!
Well~ That definitely won't satisfy you.
Alright! Then let's enjoy a 3-day and 3-night Pirate-Style event, the âFeast of Billows"...
Huh? Still no? Then how about a whole 7-day "Feast of Rough Seas"?
What, an ordinary feast will do? You really have no ambition.
Then next time I'll just let you come onboard my ship!
We'll flow like the wind on the infinite sea. Wouldn't that really be something?!
Me too... When I feel too tired, or want some solitude, I usually go sailing and let the waves carry me anywhere.
And toss all the fatigue and frustrations into the sea.
We still have a long way to go, you and I.
We'll work well together from now!
{Avatar_Name1}, I've made an apple pie for you!
Be sure to eat it later!
Huh? Why make apple pie all of a sudden...?
How do I put it... It's actually a gift for you.
I had some... worries before we met, {Avatar_Name1}.
After all, I'm not like Noelia: I have no strength...
But I've also been wondering if there's anything I could do for this world.
However, in this time I've spent with {Avatar_Name1},
I started to feel all those missing pieces fulfilled, one by one.
So I thought to myself.
It turns out I've been waiting for you to come...
So it delights me so much to be with you.
We really... have once...
No, forget it... I didn't say anything.
{Avatar_Name1} is just {Avatar_Name1}!
Hope we'll keep working well together!
Beautifully done, {Avatar_Name1}! That's my God's Envoy!
Good. Now I can continue crafting Snow.
This is essential for recreating Snow's beautiful eyes.
Well, the normal version is okay, but this festive version is hard to give up!
Then get the red one and make a pair with meâª
Rubbish! It would be disrespecting Snow to be with you!
Whaaaaat?!
Those two are always ready to argue. Sorry for that!
That level of stubbornness can be unusual when it comes to Idols...
But that... can also be put to good use.
Heehee... nothing.
Things are slowly shaping up, all thanks to you.
Please keep going as you are with the investigation!
...and please say hello for me...
to Yuelia.
See you around then.
Hi, {Avatar_Name1}.
Sorry to barge in. Just curious about what this âBulletin Board" thingy is.
As Ruler of Al Maajik I'm required to understand all things. I have learned a lot this time.
Thank you for keeping me company.
That thing just now IS the thank-you gift
And also, my sister is in good hands with you.
...Did I ever tell you about my dream?
My dream is to conquer the world.
Not to conquer by force, by the way.
Not violently, but gently bring the world together, that's what I mean by conquer.
I've undertaken different studies, but lectures along is far from enough.
Hence, I had you teach me what I need to know.
Thank you, {Avatar_Name1}.
I will become a Dark Sultan worthy of your attention. Watch for this.
Heehee.
Let's keep working together, {Avatar_Name1}.
{Avatar_Name1}! I'm just itching to come and play.
I'm not interrupting anything, am I...?
Very good...
Namona is similar to where I live.
So I get this sense of peace...
Staying here relaxes me.
But wait, maybe that's because I'm with {Avatar_Name1}.
...{Avatar_Name1}.
I feel that I've changed too since meeting you.
Before meeting you, I knew next to nothing about the world outside.
Being able to get outside and learn all kinds of things has made me maturer.
May-Maybe I'm just over thinking...
Hahah! Thank you.
Makes me hopeful to hear you say that, Lord {Avatar_Name1}!
...Next time, I should be the one to step up.
I should help out {Avatar_Name1} just as you did for me!
Feel free to talk to me if you ever run into any trouble.
We're friends a-after all!
Eheheh.
We'll work well together from now on!
You're as good as ever, running around to make others' wishes come true.
This world is still under threat.
You probably have more important things to deal with, huh?
Forget it... This is who you are, after all.
Looking at you, a lot of new things have been occurring to me.
I think maybe you being a pushover is not in vain after all.
So carry on your merry way and realize the wishes of others.
I'll help you save the world in my own way.
What? Are you not happy with my assistance?
Hmph! I'm just carrying on as I wish.
It's all for besting powerful opponents, for honing personal abilities.
Hmph... That's all I had to say. I'm off.
{Avatar_Name1} Apologies for the sudden interruption.
I was working on an item and ran out of material halfway...
So I had to come to you.
Thank you. You're so nice.
So... what did I make... it's actually a present for you.
You've been good to me, and you helped out with training. I'm really grateful.
So I wanted to express my gratitude.
What do I give you exactly? I thought hard but I have no clue...
Finally I made a âpudding" using a recipe from Ms. Josette the Palace Head Chef.
But I'm new to this, so if it's not exactly to your liking then...
...No. No need to be negative.
I poured my heart and soul into it. Please try some.
Great.
It's not for nothing I helped on the farm to get high-quality ingredients.
Let's work well together from now on.
{Avatar_Name1} Thank you always.
âWhy so formal?" Is that what you wanted to ask?
Ahahaha! I just feel like saying so.
With you, I get to battle various enemies. A real blessing for a Mercenary! By the way...
In any case, I've always held the view that most Mercenaries are all after freedom.
Unlike the discipline-valuing Paladin, or the Magicians who must keep the world balanced.
Not caring about these.
Just combat against powerful rivals!
We're often single-minded guys like this.
And it's the same in my case. So whenever you need help, I'll be there.
It would be great if you too could learn to love this free Mercenary life.
And that's all I have to say. In future, I hope you will work well with me.
Thanks for your continued dedication, {Avatar_Name1}.
You've been protecting this world from Shadow Power.
So the world's sea can retain her beauty.
What I just gave you is a small token of my appreciation.
It would make me very happy if you'd accept it.
We Port Puerto residents co-exist with the sea.
We can't stand it to have our beloved sea befouled.
The ones befouling our sea must bear punishment...
Hehe, you understand this sentiment, surely.
As sea lovers...
Let's keep giving it our all from now on.
Haha, caught off-guard, eh?
I just gave you a thank-you gift.
Meeting you has been like a breath of fresh air.
What do you say? Do you feel the breeze?
Shh, there's no need to say a word. Your face basically says it all.
Must be tough being a God's Envoy...
You may not show it, but it is difficult.
So... anytime you need a breath of wind, just ask me.
This is how our partnership works.
I'll come with the wind whenever you call to me.
That was close! Almost forgot the most important thing.
{Avatar_Name1} Thank you, for always. Let's keep it up.
...Well then.
Ha!
You were a massive helped just now, {Avatar_Name1}.
Vidal and Lily have been fighting a lot lately. Could it be the rebellion phase?
Teaching as my protÃ©gÃ© was really a huge help.
I need to conserve my energy for when it's really needed, after all...
The world is in crisis, as you well know.
The world had been functioning because Light and Shadow were balanced
But Shadow suddenly overshadowed Light, and the balance is starting to collapse.
It's our duty as Magicians to do everything in our power to prevent this collapse.
So I have a valid reason for sleeping in.
Well... Just kidding.
Hahah. But seriously, the world's balance is a real thing.
The world needs Shadow as critically as it needs Light.
And your presence as well.
After all, this world will never have real peace without you.
So you have to keep going. Watch yourself both in work and in rest. I'll do my best too.
...Well then.
Hey, {Avatar_Name1}!
What do you think about my little gift? Hope you like it.
Just a daily thank-you gift.
For always making me laugh, {Avatar_Name1}!
Laughter is the best medicine, you know!
It really wears you down to be miserable every day. It makes you stop progressing.
And it also affects everyone around you. Emotions are catching.
So the worse you feel, the wider you need to smile.
You can overcome almost anything with good humor!
This is something I learned from that guy too.
It's hard to believe but it's the truth, hahaha!
And if you can't get yourself to raise a smile, then I'll be there to do it.
You'll laugh until you cry.
Good you say that! Hahaha!
Let's work well together from now on, {Avatar_Name1}!
Thanks for your continued dedication, {Avatar_Name1}.
I just gave you a daily thank-you gift.
Please accept it.
Have you gone fishing lately, {Avatar_Name1}?
If not, would you like to try fishing at night?
Stretch a fishing line out under a silent night sky, and lie patiently in wait.
There's no way you don't relax this way, having your whole body immersed in nature.
Being a God's Envoy keeps you busy every day, {Avatar_Name1}.
Trying something new that makes you review your life would be a good thing to do.
If you toil till dark you risk not being able to see your way.
Please call on me if ever you feel lonely walking alone.
Whenever you need me, I'll walk with you.
Hahah! Looking forward to working well with you.
What a catch! And it's all thanks to you, {Avatar_Name1}!
I've just given you some fish. Please accept it!
So without further ado, let's celebrate!
Hmm? What are we celebrating?
Today's catch of course! And also...
A daily show of thanks to {Avatar_Name1}!
We get to be happy every day all because of you, {Avatar_Name1}.
This fish here is for expressing gratitude!
Yikes, what do we do now? I can fish, but I don't know how to cook...
What? {Avatar_Name1}, you can cook...?!
I'm embarrassed to ask, since you're a guest, but...
Can I ask you just this time?
What a kind answer!
Leave everything else to me!
The Plushling dance, as well as Hawke's on-point target shooting...
I've arranged many performances! We wholeheartedly present our sincere gratitude!
Hehe, enjoy yourself, please.
Did the sudden mission scare you a little? Hahaha!
This time it's actually not about satisfying any of my wishes
I actually want to hand you a gift.
You've been very good to me, you know!
I would like to express my gratitude too.
Thank you, {Avatar_Name1}, always.
We've known each other for long.
I have a daughter myself, but watching you grow has also been quite fascinating.
âI must also grow stronger!" You've made me feel like this.
It's rare and commendable to have a friend to learn from.
That's why I truly feel fortunate to have met you.
May our relationship grow tall and strong like a tree, now and in future.
Well met!
You, {Avatar_Name1}, are out of this world.
Not in a bad way of course, hahaha!
Very warm, broad-minded, yet still unreadable and unmeasurable...
Perhaps that's exactly what draws people in though...
... and not just âpeople".
I may not be a Magician, but I too hear the spirits.
The Spirits alighting on this land seem to like you. A lot.
To have you rule the Namona Land is a fortunate thing.
And I myself...
Really appreciate your kind help that you extend often.
I really hope that we can also help each other in future.
Heheh, I'm counting on you.
Did my sudden visit frighten you?
This is a daily thank-you gift.
It can be used in forging and so on.
Ahem. Apologies. I don't mean to stare.
I'm just not very good at making conversation. Well, I mean...
...I'm a Blacksmith by profession.
I may not be suited to combat, but I can craft Gear.
I hope I can lend you a hand with such.
So. If you ever need Gear crafted, call me.
I would never reject any commission from you.
Whoo-wee... still got it.
So. Look forward to working with you.
I see you've been hard at work, so I've got a gift for youâª
You must take good care of it.
...However,
You're bustling about and busy as ever, being a God's Envoy.
Feel free to call me if you're occupied with alchemy tasks,
I'll helpâª
Oh, one more thing! I'm available for consultation about relationship problems too!
We absolutely need the power of love to defeat evil of course!
Love is power!
Human or not, it doesn't matter. All beings have the right to love.
Of course, I'm included too, right?
Woopsies, did I scare you? How you interpret that is up to youâª
Looking forward to working togetherâª
Surprised? Ahaha!
I made this gift for you, {Avatar_Name1}
Thanks for doing great every day!
{Avatar_Name1}? It must be pretty tough being a God's Envoy huh?
And practicing so many different Lives!
I guess you probably don't have a lot of time for this kind of tailoring work.
So... I want to see if I can help thou in my own way...
I-Is that a bit weird...?
Awesome~!
Uh oh! I used âthou" again... It keeps flowing out~
However, a journey of a thousand miles also begins with one step.
Hehe, {Avatar_Name1}. I know you're fighting hard too!
I'm also going to keep making adorable outfits. I'll improve my skills even further!
Let's give it our all from now on, {Avatar_Name1}!
Sorry for bothering you!
It's a bit late, but I wanted to give {Avatar_Name1} a thank-you gift.
Thank you always, {Avatar_Name1}!
Use this when making tools and furnitureâª
Seeing you working so hard, {Avatar_Name1}
I can't help but wonder if there's anything I can do to help you out.
Although I can't take over your God's Envoy duties
I can fully support your carpentry work!
And you know what?! I'm good at using Palm Beams and Water Beams!
As long as it's for you, {Avatar_Name1}, I'll give it my all!
If one person is not enough, then have two! And if two are not enough, then everybody in!
With everybody all in, there's no difficulty that can't be overcome.
Come on, {Avatar_Name1}! Let's go!
Must have scared you, making such a sudden request.
I want to give you something to show my gratitude, but I never get the opportunity.
I probably should be more straightforward. I just would be very happy if you could accept it.
To the best of my ability, I thought up all the things that could make you happy.
If it's something too big, it'll take up space
And if it's too expensive then you won't accept it, right?
Something not too expensive but sophisticated enough to be useful... then I came up with this.
I'm a Carpenter after all. I might not be much help in combat
but crafting this bow and staff gives the feeling of fighting alongside you.
It is also thanks to you I get to experience this feeling.
Thanks, hahah! And also, let's keep working well together.
Hi, {Avatar_Name1}.
Just gave you a daily thank-you gift.
Fabric is always a necessity. No amount of it feels enough.
But you're busy all day and I'm sure you have too much on your plate, so I've sewn it for you.
It's okay! Compared to all you've given me, this little favor's nothing.
I'm completely lost on what you're referring to... The look on your face tells me everything.
Your presence here has opened up a completely new world for me.
Adventuring with you and sewing with you has all given me a brand-new vision!
I hope to make an outfit with you as the theme one day.
I promise you'll get the first look when the time comes.
Allow me to formally thank you.
Thank you for always being here. I hope we'll work well from today on.
I immediately made medicine with the material you gave me.
Hope you will take it.
What? Go ahead, don't worry about it.
I did this for you.
You're always getting into scrapes. Always makes me worry if you're hurt or not.
If I could be around, I'd be drowning you in medicine. But I can't be.
However, anyone can use medicine and carry it with them.
It's been good working with you. I made this for you, my daily gratitude.
Thing is... my material ran out halfway, so I'm afraid I needed your help.
âShe" is also really grateful... I would be very happy if you would accept it.
Heeheeh, thank you, {Avatar_Name1}. Let's keep it up.
You've been working hard, {Avatar_Name1}. So, I made this for you.
And please do try my hand-made apple treatsâª
You know... {Avatar_Name1}, you always seem busy.
I'm glad you're working so hard for us, but I still worry a little...
Do you have a proper breakfast, lunch and dinner?
After adventuring, do you sometimes go to bed immediately without eating?
If you can't shake off fatigue, just eat something sweet!
Delicious treats melt softly and go deep into the body and mind, restoring vitality in an instant.
Remember to give me a shout if you'd like something sweet.
My hand-made desserts will completely heal your body and mindâª
Okay then! {Avatar_Name1}, thanks for your continued dedication!
Let's keep working well together!
Ohhh, this place is actually not bad~!
How about I stay here too!
Only joking, hahahah! But it's really comfortable here!
I really am... so glad I met you.
Hahah! Why do you look shocked? It's true!
I've also been working hard to protect the citizens of Castele... always.
However, thinking about how you're fighting for all of Reveria
makes me feel I must improve my skills.
You came in like a meteor shower and effortlessly beat down the enemy. You really are incredible.
And how you just stood your ground like that... really struck me the most.
You completely see through me, yet I can't see through you at all~
I'm only kidding! Hahah!
I want to say this officially... it's not easy, but it needs to be said.
Thank you, for bringing me this unexpected encounter, {Avatar_Name1}.
Let's keep working well together!
{Avatar_Name1}.
Do you feel at home on this land yet?
...Well.
Feels like it was just yesterday you and Yuelia woke me up.
So much has happened since that day.
It's really been a source of courage for me to see you always heroically rise to every challenge.
And also... your arrival to Namona has really brought new life to this land.
And all living things have a glow to them now. People, animals or even plant life.
So if I could say,
Thank you, {Avatar_Name1}.
I hope you can start to consider this place your second home.
So, you're welcome to come home anytime.
Heheh. Let's work well together from now on, {Avatar_Name1}.
{Avatar_Name1}? How long have we known each other now?
Wow! Only~?!
Feels like we've known each other longer than that,
But you know...
I still remember our first meeting, very clearly.
I remember seeing a glimmer of hope in you.
And I was sure this was the one to save this world.
And now, a demon creeps ever closer to Reveria.
The âChaos Dragon"... A vicious dragon hell-bent on destruction.
Thanks to you, this world held on, but who knows the next time something happens again.
I don't want anyone else to go through what I did...
So please, be sure to stop this evil.
But you won't be fighting alone of course. I'll also do my best!
I may only have little power now...
but your kindness will be returned in full one day.
Thank you for remaining dedicated.
So then, let's work well together from now on {Avatar_Name1}.
And that look?
Did I surprise you?
...I recognize all your efforts.
I could never dislike hard workers.
I only dislike those who have talent but don't value it, and actually despise hard work
Those kinds of people are hopeless idiots.
Talented people should stay modest and work on further improving their abilities.
Only those who can do these things can rise to the top.
A certain... dove-like Magician seems unable to grasp these ideas.
Forget it. I've said enough. This has nothing to do with you.
You must know it well, {Avatar_Name1}.
Just keep up the good work.
And don't disappoint me.
Phew, we will work well together.
W-Was that very abrupt?
That gift wasn't to thank you for your help but it's a daily thank-you gift.
I've also grown in many ways since meeting you.
And as an undercover cadet, I've gradually learned my stuff. And all that is because of you.
I've also grown in many ways since meeting you.
And as an undercover cadet, I've gradually learned my stuff. And all that is because of you.
So in return, I've done some cooking...
Isn't it only natural to show appreciation to those who take care of you?
W-What does that look mean?!
Is it so weird that I'd cook?
I... I can manage those things as long as I try!
Although I will say... parts of the food may be burnt...
Um... if you don't want it then you could toss it...
R-Really...? Fine then...
Uhh, nothing, forget it.
I'll look out for you too from now on, as comrade.
Thanks for always being available to help, {Avatar_Name1}!
There's a daily thank-you gift! Take it!
You've been good to Leilah as well.
Leilah is the little sister of a good friend of mine. You could say she's my sister too!
That guy is away... and I left too. Must have made her feel pretty lonely.
And all those responsibilities as a Guardian of the Forest. I hope she hasn't become cocky.
It's all because you have her back with all this stuff, right?
On behalf of her brother: thank you. Thank you very much!
Leilah is a little bit of a shrinking violet, but she's a candid girl!
So you already knew all this! Then I've said more than enough!
Hope you'll get on well with her too then!
And with me too!
Mm-hmm! That's that then. We'll work well together!
Yahoo! Are you alright?
...No. Cough cough!
Thank you for your continued dedication, God's Envoy.
The world is also gradually getting better, and it's all thanks to you.
However... some threats still remain.
We'll probably still have to rely on your power...
So I bring smiles to everyone's faces with a concert
I'm really glad to have helped you as much as I could.
If you ever need a hand from a Mercenary, please be sure to ask!
Um...God's Envoy? How about joining me up on stage next time?
That's something everyone would really love, if you ask me!
You wouldn't want to...? Well, that's a shame.
Then...
Hope you'll get on well with Snow from now on! âª
Er... {Avatar_Name1}... so, um...
There's a... thing I wanted to say to you...
Not really sure how to put it... well...
I... I like you...!
Ha!
No no no, that's not what I mean!
Um, no! Well it's not like I don't mean that but...
It's... um... I need a moment...
Phew...
Sorry, I annoyed you.
I just wanted to pass on some thoughts I usually have.
I'm just so grateful to you for giving someone like me a shot at a life like this...!
The time we've spent together has been nice and... I really like you very much.
It would make me especially happy if you felt the same way too...
Yay! Together then...!
Oops... Is that a bit forward of me...?
Oh... that's great then.
Hope I'm not being a burden but... I hope you'll look out for me...!
Look: freshly made! Have some while it's still hot!
Why would I randomly cook for you?
Seeing how hard you work as a God's Envoy makes me want to spoil you with food.
You can't keep this up... or you will ruin your health.
Strong as I am, even I used to get sick from pushing too hard.
But I guess as a God's Envoy, you do need to push yourself really far sometimes.
...I'll look after you. Anyway my cooking can help, I'll do it.
So, you give it your all and I'll take care of the rest.
But if I see you not doing so well, then I can pull you back a bit right?
Hahah! I like that nod!
Come to me whenever you're hungry.
I'll whip you up something yummy.
Let's work well together, {Avatar_Name1}.
That was a thank-you gift.
You've been really good to me.
Also...I heard you've been good to M'Lady as well.
Looks like you and M'Lady get along pretty well.
M'Lady is Princess of Castele, but she's reckless and impulsive. She's always getting into things.
Could be searching for a lost kitten or some scuffle caused by an apple thief,
but if ever anyone is in trouble, she'll immediately step in, regardless of her own safety.
And that's the reason she's always yelling for me too...
But I wouldn't say that's a bad thing.
That's one similarity I see with you and M'Lady.
I'll say one thing though... You two will easily get into trouble.
Don't worry. I'm not saying it's a bad thing.
It's just fearless folks like yourselves always need someone watching your back.
I'm used to watching out and tending to people. If you ever need help, call me.
I'm sure we'll have a long relationship.
Let's do work well together then.
Apologies for that. Thanks a lot for your help.
We've been doing well for a while now. Here's your daily thank-you gift.
Many thanks, {Avatar_Name1}.
The forest will thrive now. All thanks to your hard work as God's Envoy.
It's the black monster that agitated all the wild beasts and earlier monsters.
I can't take it, seeing them hurting each other over something like that...
I've been trying to protect them, but I can't do it all on my own.
And we can never achieve peace if we fail to address the root cause of this problem.
But we have a chance at peace with you, God's Envoy.
Sorry for the burden, but I need to ask you for your help.
I'll also do my part, of course.
I hope we can all do our best.
...Thanks, everyone.
Let's look out for each other.
